thread.title: James Pemberton
thread.title_full: SHOWER SEAL LTD reviewed by James Pemberton

author: James Pemberton
title: James Pemberton
text: My aunt slipped in the shower and damaged the fittings of the door of her infinity shower. Replaced the bottom one (next day delivery, as it says).... Now got the top wheel thing as well (3-5 working days, came in three). Excellent service, excellent replacement parts, excellent price. Doubt I'll ever need spares for a shower again, so good luck.
